name: Testacles
descriptions: Testacles the Debug Centurion is a test cell character in the game files of Fallout: New Vegas.
Upon being spoken to he can alter the Courier's Reputation with various factions of the Mojave Wasteland, spawn Rex, edit quest outcomes and many other aspects of the game.
Testacles is a test cell character in the game files of Fallout: New Vegas.
Testacles' name is a reference to a debug character featured in another Black Isle/Obsidian game, Planescape: Torment.
